author: "Daniel Allington"
date: "2024-03-07"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

misinfo_d <- read_csv('../data/life-under-lockdown-wave2-extract.csv')
```

```{r}
misinfo_d %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = gender)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
misinfo_d %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = beliefs)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 6)
```
